property.name: description
property.value: IPv4 address of ViPR standalone server. (The value 0.0.0.0 disables IPv4.)

property.name: description
property.value: The IPv4 address that the UI and REST clients use to access ViPR. Must be different from the IPv4 addresses of ViPR servers. (The value 0.0.0.0 disables IPv4.)

property.name: description
property.value: IP address of the default IPv4 gateway. (The value 0.0.0.0 disables IPv4.)

property.name: description
property.value: IPv6 address of ViPR standalone server. (The value ::0 disables IPv6.)

property.name: description
property.value: The IPv6 address that the UI and REST clients use to access ViPR. Must be different from the IPv6 addresses of ViPR servers. (The value ::0 disables IPv6.)

property.name: description
property.value: IP address of the default IPv6 gateway. (The value ::0 disables IPv6.)

property.name: description
property.value: 2-3 DNS servers (IP addresses separated by commas).

property.name: description
property.value: 2-3 NTP servers (IP addresses separated by commas).

property.name: description
property.value: FQDN or IP address of the server that serves Compute Images for OS installation during PXE boot process

property.name: description
property.value: IP address of the Image Server on the OS install network

property.name: description
property.value: Username to access the Image Server

property.name: description
property.value: Password to access the Image Server

property.name: description
property.value: Path to TFTP server root directory where the Compute Images will be uploaded

property.name: description
property.value: Directory to store images (relative to TFTPBOOT) on the Image Server

property.name: description
property.value: SSH port for communication with Image Server

property.name: description
property.value: Timeout value for SSH communication with Image Server (in seconds)

property.name: description
property.value: Timeout value for image import (in seconds)

property.name: description
property.value: Timeout value for OS installation (in seconds)

property.name: description
property.value: URL of the EMC upgrade repository.

property.name: description
property.value: HTTP/HTTPS proxy required to access the EMC upgrade repository. Leave empty if no proxy is required.

property.name: description
property.value: Username to access the EMC upgrade repository.

property.name: description
property.value: Password to access the EMC upgrade repository.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of hours between checks for new upgrade versions

property.name: description
property.value: Encrypt ConnectEMC Service data using RSA BSAFE.

property.name: description
property.value: List of acceptable transport options for ConnectEMC.

property.name: description
property.value: SMTP server or relay for sending email.

property.name: description
property.value: SMTP server port. If set to 0, the default SMTP port is used (25, or 465 if TLS/SSL is enabled).

property.name: description
property.value: Use TLS/SSL for the SMTP server connections.

property.name: description
property.value: Validate TLS/SSL certificates for the SMTP server connections.

property.name: description
property.value: ConnectEMC service target email address (example: emailalert@emc.com).

property.name: description
property.value: From email address for sending email messages (user@domain).

property.name: description
property.value: Optional list of email addresses (user@domain) for the ConnectEMC Service notifications (email addresses separated by commas)

property.name: description
property.value: Authentication type for connecting to the SMTP server.

property.name: description
property.value: Username for authenticating with the SMTP server.

property.name: description
property.value: Password for authenticating with the SMTP server.

property.name: description
property.value: Encrypted (SHA-512) password for the local 'root' account

property.name: description
property.value: 'root' password expiry date in the form of number of days since epoch

property.name: description
property.value: Authorized public SSH keys for the local 'root' account.

property.name: description
property.value: Encrypted (SHA-512) password for the local 'svcuser' account.

property.name: description
property.value: 'svcuser' password expiry date in the form of number of days since epoch

property.name: description
property.value: Authorized public SSH keys for the local 'svcuser' account.

property.name: description
property.value: Encrypted (SHA-512) password for the local 'proxyuser' account.

property.name: description
property.value: Encrypted password for the local 'sysmonitor' account.

property.value: Host DSA Private Keys for SSH

property.value: Host RSA Private Keys for SSH

property.value: Permit the root account ssh access to the servers.

property.value: Permit the root account to login to the console of the servers.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds between metering operations.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds between discovery operations of storage systems.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of threads each node uses for discovery of storage system.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds between scan operations of SMI-S providers.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds between discovery operations of switches (fabric managers).

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds between discovery operations of Vblock Compute Systems.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds between discovery operations of Hosts and VMware vCenters (host/vcenters).

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds before a new metering operation is allowed since the last metering operation.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds before a new discovery operation is allowed since the last discovery operation.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds before a new scan operation is allowed since the last scan of SMI-S provider operation.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds before a new discovery of switches (fabric managers) is allowed since the last discovery operation.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds before a new discovery of Vblock Compute Systems is allowed since the last discovery operation.

property.name: label
property.value: Hosts and VMware vCenters Refresh Interval

property.name: description
property.value: Number of seconds before a new discovery of Hosts and VMware vCenters (host/vcenters) is allowed since the last discovery operation.

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates whether auto-scan of SMI-S providers is enabled.

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates whether array monitoring is enabled.

property.value: Minimum supported version for SMI-S Provider. Version format : MajorVersion.MinorVersion.RevisionNumber.BuildNumber.

property.value: Minimum supported version for ScaleIO. Version format : MajorVersion_MinorVersion.RevisionNumber.BuildNumber.

property.value: Maximum percentage of storage pool utilization for provisioning operations.

property.value: Maximum percentage of thin storage pool subscription for provisioning operations.

property.value: Minimum supported firmware version for VNX File. Version format : MajorVersion.MinorVersion.Revision

property.name: description
property.value: ViPR instance URL that the VASA storage provider can utilize. By default the VASA provider utilizes the local ViPR node.

property.name: description
property.value: Alert names to be received by the ViPR Controller

property.name: description
property.value: The login banner that will be displayed during login process.

property.name: value
property.value: You are accessing ViPR. By using this system you consent to the owning organization's terms and conditions.

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum supported firmware version for VPLEX. Version format : MajorVersion.MinorVersion

property.name: description
property.value: 'Only During Discovery' mode will collect all VPLEX backend volume data during Unmanaged Volume discovery (this mode is the default and is recommended for ingesting large numbers of volumes at once, and full ingestion will fail on an individual volume if any data is missing from the database). 'Only During Ingestion' mode will delay discovery of backend volumes until ingestion time (this mode is recommended for ingesting a few specific volumes at once so that discovery will run faster). 'During Discovery and Ingestion' will attempt to collect as much data as possible during discovery, and will check again during ingestion if any needed backend volume data is missing from the database (this mode is the most flexible, but may exhibit somewhat unpredictable performance).

property.name: allowedValues
property.value: Only During Discovery,Only During Ingestion,During Discovery and Ingestion

property.name: description
property.value: Regex filter to place on the virtual volume name. Only those matching will be discovered. E.g.: '(.*VAPM00140844981-017.*|.*V000198700406.*)'.

property.name: description
property.value: Set to 'stop' to cancel current VPLEX volume discovery operation. Be sure to set back to 'run' in order for volume discovery to start next time.

property.name: label
property.value: VPLEX volume expansion status check retry count

property.name: description
property.value: Retry count to check vplex volume expansion status

property.name: label
property.value: VPLEX volume expansion status check retry max wait

property.name: description
property.value: Max wait before next retry to check vplex volume expansion status

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum supported version for Windows. Version format : MajorVersion.MinorVersion.BuildNumber

property.value: Minimum supported version for HPUX. Version format : MajorVersion.MinorVersion.BuildNumber

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum supported firmware version for RecoverPoint. Version format : MajorVersion.MinorVersion.ServicePack

property.name: description
property.value: Co-exist mask zone refresh behavior. Always means the zones will be refreshed each time the mask is refreshed. Otherwise, the zones are refreshed only when initiator or ports are changed.

property.name: label
property.value: Network system Brocade endpoints discovery by fabric

property.name: description
property.value: Brocade endpoints discovery from SMIS agent. True means the endpoints will be discovered per fabric which can be slow. Otherwise, the system will get all endpoints and all the associations to the fabrics and assign each endpoint to its fabric. This way of finding endpoints uses more memory and may not be suitable for large environments.

property.name: description
property.value: Timeout value for Cisco MDS command in seconds

property.value: Time in seconds to wait for various operations made to entities in vCenter

property.name: description
property.value: A FTPS file server to store backup files.

property.name: description
property.value: Username to login to backup file server

property.name: description
property.value: Password to login to backup file server.

property.name: description
property.value: Turn backup scheduler on or off

property.name: description
property.value: The time scheduled backup starts, based on local time zone(hour:minute)

property.name: description
property.value: The time interval in unit of Day(or Week/Month) between scheduled backups

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of scheduled backup copies to save on the ViPR nodes. Once this is reached, older scheduled backup copies are deleted from the nodes so that newer ones can be saved

property.name: description
property.value: Backup files used disk percentage upper limit

property.name: description
property.value: Disable backup when disk used percentage up to this limit

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of manually created backup copies to save on the ViPR nodes. Once this is reached, no copies can be created until you manually delete the older manually created copies from the nodes

property.name: description
property.value: Amount of time (in seconds) that vipr reports timeout when connecting ldap/AD server (0 means vipr will wait forever)

property.name: description
property.value: Amount of time (in minutes) that a local user password must be in use before it can be changed.(valid value range is [0-1440], 0 allows changes immediately.)

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum number of characters that a local user password must contain. (0 means no minimum number is required.)

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum number of lowercase alphabetic characters that a local user password must contain.

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum number of uppercase alphabetic characters that a local user password must contain.

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum number of numeric characters that a local user password must contain.

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum number of special characters that a local user password must contain.

property.name: description
property.value: Maximum number of consecutive repeating characters that a local user password can contain. (0 means disable repeating characters check)

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum number of characters that must be changed in local user password.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of unique passwords required before an old local user password can be reused.(0 means a password can be reused immediately.)

property.name: description
property.value: Number of days that a local user password can be in use before ViPR requires a password change.(valid value range is [14-365], 0 means the password will never expire.). WARNING: Be sure to configure root and svcuser email before enabling Expire Time.

property.name: description
property.value: The max number of consecutive login failed attempts before locking out the client IP (valid value range is [0-20], 0 means no lockout)

property.name: description
property.value: Time to wait for a blocked client IP to be unblocked (valid value range is [0-1440], 0 means no lockout)

property.name: description
property.value: The life time of a token in minutes (valid value range is [5-1440])

property.name: description
property.value: The idle time of a token in minutes (valid value range is [5-1440])

property.name: description
property.value: Minimum supported version for VMware ESX. Version format : MajorVersion[.MinorVersion[.MinorVersion...]]

property.name: description
property.value: Short node names can be used for API query parameters and SSH between nodes. A Node short name is everything before the first '.' in the node name and must be unique.

property.name: description
property.value: Maximum number of seconds before an inactive SMI-S is reaped. Should be less than the Discovery Scan interval. If set to 0, reaping is disabled.
